thread.title: WATCH: Paul Merson Makes Controversial Statement About Gabriel Jesus
thread.title_full: WATCH: Paul Merson Makes Controversial Statement About Gabriel Jesus

title: WATCH: Paul Merson Makes Controversial Statement About Gabriel Jesus
text:
WATCH: Paul Merson Makes Controversial Statement About Gabriel Jesus Sat Feb 11 2017 23:07:38   23:07:38 GMT+0000 (GMT) Nasir Jabbar Nasir Jabbar in football 
Gabriel Jesus has burst onto the scene following his goals and assists for Manchester City but according to Paul Merson (who else?!) he's nothing to get excited about. 
The Brazilian has played four times for City, bagging three goals while creating two including a match winning brace against Swansea City in the Premier League. 
And while he excites the City faithfuls as well as striking fear into opposition defenders, the Sky pundit isn't buying into his hype: Paul Merson tells City fans how it is about Gabriel Jesus... pic.twitter.com/4QJPTJvtnx 
"It's not a bad move, but it ain't Man United is it?!" Interesting comments. No doubt this will cause a stir. 
Do you agree with 'Merse' or is he completely wrong? Sound off in the comments section below. Sponsored Links
